text:
Hello <@UJAPS2K4N> and thank you for the information.

One follow up question that comes to mind regarding your suggestions not to use “dnd” areas. We want our dynamic pages to be editable by marketers.

One of the options we want them to have is the ability to change the position of elements on the dynamic pages.
It sounds like with your suggestion that any change to the position of elements would need to be performed by a developer and done via HTML.

Is that correct?
